name: Hypoxia (JammerTankers)
description:
WEBGL Version might be buggy!

You only have one minute of oxigen in your suit.

"Something has hitted your spaceship, alarms are going off and you are running low on oxygen"
Hypoxia is an inmersive adventure game where you have to survive through the weird events that have happened in your spacehips in a Zero Gravity environment.
With only one minute of oxygen you'll need to search for more O2 Tanks but be carefull, since using Oxygen to impulse yourself in zero gravity will quickly deplete it aswell.
